mapper.insert: INSERT INTO history(hid, huid, hoid, type, filepath, uptime, filesize,score) VALUES (#{hid}, #{huid}, #{hoid}, #{type}, #{filepath}, #{uptime}, #{filesize}, #{score})
mapper.update: UPDATE history SET type = #{type}, filepath = #{filepath}, uptime = #{uptime}, filesize = #{filesize}, score = #{score} WHERE hid = #{hid}
